item.description:
What is the approach that Buddhist takes to these conroversial issues? Is it ever ethical to commit suicide? Is abortion a "sin"? How can women deal with abortion? Explore the realms of applied Buddhist ethics. Excerpt readings from Buddhist Ethics by Damian Keown and Ocean by Kenneth Tanaka. Presented by Daikan.

See our CALENDAR @

www.bffct.net

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Middletown Buddhist Meetup Group at Wesleyan Meetup
